content: विदूर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Remote, distant; सरिद्विदूरांतरभावतन्वी <ls>R. 13. 48</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 39.</ls> --रः <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain or city from which the Vaidūrya jewel or {%lapis lazuli%} is brought; विदूरभूमिर्नवमेघशब्दादुद्भिन्नया रत्नशलाकयेव <ls>Ku. 1. 24</ls>; see Malli thereon, as well as on <ls>Śi. 3. 45.</ls> (The forms विदूरं, विदूरेण, विदूरतस् or विदूरात् are often used adverbially in the sense of ‘from a distance,’ ‘from afar’, ‘at a distance’, ‘far off’; <ls>Māl. 3. 18.</ls>).
